title: Phat
description: All girls have body image issues...At least that’s what Abby Montgomery tells herself. It’s not unusual that she won’t be caught dead in a bikini or that she binges and purges every now and then. Sometimes you have to go to drastic measures in order to be thin.This summer everything changes...When her parents send her away to Escape, Colorado for the summer, things get interesting. Escape Reality Wellness Camp is just like every other summer camp...only phatter.
author: Taylor Henderson
